price: ហើយពិតប្រាកដណាស់ អ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)ត្រូវគេផ្ដល់ឱ្យនូវ គម្ពីរគួរអានពីម្ចាស់មហាគតិបណ្ឌិត មហាដឹង។
arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
